item_name: Amazfit GTS 2 Mini Smartwatch 1.55" AMOLED Screen GPS jam tangan 5 ATM waterproof 70 Sports Modes SpO2 14 Days Battery Life Heart Rate Sleep Stress
item_desc:
Smartwatch Amazfit GTS 2 Mini | 1.55" AMOLED Screen | GPS | 5 ATM waterproof | 70+ Sports Modes | SpO2 | 14 Days Battery Life | Heart Rate, Sleep & Stress Monitoring


























Unique Design on Your Wrist
Amazfit GTS 2 mini smart watch adopts a borderless design & curved 2.5D glass, weighing only 19.5 g. With a vibrant 1.55-inch AMOLED screen and 50+ watch faces, you may customize your favorite watch face.

All-round Health Tracking
Amazfit GTS 2 mini smartwatch can provide 24-hour heart rate monitoring, SpO2 measurement, and sleep quality and stress level monitoring. Also included is the PAI health assessment system to convert complex health and activity data into a single score, to help you understand your physical state.

70+ Sports Modes & 50 Meters Waterproof 
With over 70 built-in sports modes and 5 ATM water-resistance, the GTS 2 mini sports watch covers most sports enthusiasts. The sports watch can also control the music on your phone, provide notifications about exercise stages, conditions and heart rate zones, and generate a sport data report in the App after finishing your workout.

SpO2 and Stress Level Measurement
After engaging in intense physical or mental activity, hold your arm still and test your SpO2 level to get a better understanding of your condition. With the GTS 2 mini smartwatch, you can also check to see where your personal stress level lies - from relaxed, normal, medium or high - and get some suggestions on how to reduce it.

14-day Battery Life
A fully-optimized battery management system provides up to 14 days of battery life for the Amazfit GTS 2 mini smartwatch. Get rid of the anxiety caused by constant charging, and keep the energy flowing. The 220mAh battery is ready to power you through up to two weeks of activity.

Isi paket:
1 x Amazfit GTS 2 mini
1 x Charging cable
1 x Buku panduan manual
1 x Kartu garansi
